title: How to Install Google Play on Android

steps.title: Open the App Drawer.
steps.content: Open the App Drawer. This might vary between Android devices but will typically be a tiled icon that opens up a window to view all of your apps.

steps.title: Toggle Unknown sources on.
steps.content: Toggle Unknown sources on. In some versions of Android, you might have to check a box.

steps.title: Tap OK.
steps.content: Tap OK . This will allow you to download the Google Play APK from a third party site. “APK” stands for Android application Pack file and is used to distribute, unpack and install software onto Android devices.

steps.title: Search for the most recent version of the Google Play APK.
steps.content: Search for the most recent version of the Google Play APK.

steps.title: Open the notification center.
steps.content: Open the notification center. Once the download has finished, swipe down from the top of your screen.

steps.title: Tap Done.
steps.content: Tap Done . You are now ready to use the new Google Play.
